articles.title: Trials show new cancer vaccine could improve patient survival for some lung cancers by nearly half - Euronews
articles.description: A French biotechnology company said that its cancer vaccine was effective in decreasing the risk of death for people with some lung cancers by 41%.
articles.content:

articles.title: Will we see a return to masks and lockdowns against COVID-19 this winter? - Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance
articles.description: As COVID-19 cases start to rise in the northern hemisphere and new data indicates that non-pharmaceutical interventions were effective in cutting cases, could we see a return to winter restrictions?

articles.title: Reservoirs of SARS-CoV-2 and their potential role in Long COVID - WSWS
articles.description: There is considerable evidence that the undetected presence of SARS-CoV-2 causes many of the health problems, some severe, described in the term “Long COVID."
articles.content: A review article in Nature Immunology summarizes what is currently known about the persistence of SARS-CoV-2 virus in the body after COVID-19. Theorized as a possible cause of Long COVID, the ongoing… [+8559 chars]

articles.title: Revolutionary new ultrasound procedure could delay ageing and memory loss - BBC Science Focus Magazine

articles.content:
